templates.style: .card-wrapper { width: 28rem; padding: 2rem; background-color: rgb(240,240,240); border: 1px solid purple} .card-image {height: auto; width: 100%; } .card-button { background-color: purple; color: white; padding: 0.5rem 2rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; outline: none; border: none; cursor: pointer }
